content.p: Click on the name of each list to take you to the list sign-up page (UoN access only). SPMIC-associates - for anyone connected to our centre. SPMIC-scanner-users - people we know who are using our equipment. SPMIC-staff-UP - for staff and students based in University Park. SPMIC-staff-QMC - for staff and students based in the QMC including Life Sciences. SPMIC-seminars - to receive invitations to our External and Internal Talks (usually open to staff and associates).
